parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the value, but make sure that the value is unique among different requests. The token can only contain ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the endpoint group that you want to modify.

parameters.name: EndpointGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the endpoint group.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
The name of the endpoint group that you want to modify.

The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). The name must start with a letter.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the Global Accelerator (GA) instance is deployed. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.
